00054 const char cwwwalimod::_id[] = "wwwali";
00055 const char cwwwalimod::_conf[] = "<wwwali/><desc><wwwali/></desc>";
00056 
00057 const char *cwwwalimod::conf() {
00058   return ! (sessb.ai.flags & cvq::admin) ? "" : _conf;
00059 }
00060 
00064 cwwwalimod::cwwwalimod( cenvironment & env ) : cmod(env) {
00065     modinfo = sessb.ai.flags & cvq::admin ? mi_conf : 0;
00066 }
00067 /***************************************************************************
00068  *
00069  * *************************************************************************/
00070 void cwwwalimod::rmspace(string &s) {
00071  string::iterator ptr=s.begin(), end=s.end();
00072  while( ptr != end ) {
00073    if( isspace(*ptr) ) {
00074      s.erase(ptr);
00075      end = s.end();
00076    } else ptr ++;
00077  }
00078 }
00079 /***************************************************************************
00080  * 
00081  * *************************************************************************/
00082 void cwwwalimod::act() {
00083   vector<cinfodb::wwwali_dom_info> wadis;
00084   vector<cinfodb::wwwali_dom_info>::size_type cnt, i;
00085 
00086   out<< "<mod><wwwali>";
00087   if( !idb->wwwali_ls(sessb.ai.dom, wadis) && wadis.size() ) {
00088     bool domidok = true;
00089     cgi_var(cgi, "domid", domid);
00090     if(domid.empty()) { domidok = false; domid = wadis[0].id; }
00091     out<<"<domid id=\""<< domid <<"\"/>";
00092     for( i=0, cnt = wadis.size(); i < cnt; i++ ) {
00093       out<<"<dom id=\""<< wadis[i].id <<"\" name=\""<< wadis[i].domain <<"\"";
00094       if(wadis[i].id == domid) out<< " sel=\"1\" ";
00095       out<< "/>";
00096     }
00097     act_dom(domidok);
00098   } else out<< "<getcant/>";
00099   out<< "</wwwali></mod>";
00100 }
00104 void cwwwalimod::act_dom( bool domidok ) {
00105  vector<cinfodb::wwwali_info> wais;
00106  vector<cinfodb::wwwali_info>::size_type cnt, i;
00107  uint8_t cnt_add = 5;// always add n empty boxes
00108 
00109  if( ! idb->wwwali_dom_ls( domid, wais ) ) {
00110    if( env.cgi_rm_get() == cenvironment::rm_post && domidok ) {
00111      bool ok= true;
00112      string prefix, val, id;
00113      vector<cinfodb::wwwali_info> torep, torm(wais), toadd;
00114      vector<cinfodb::wwwali_info>::iterator ptr;
00115      cinfodb::wwwali_info uitmp;
00116      ostringstream os;
00117      
00118      out<<"<inv>";
00119      // we get list of items
00120      for( cnt=wais.size()+cnt_add, i=1; i <= cnt; i++ ) {
00121        os.str("");
00122        os<<i;
00123        if( cgi_var(cgi, "itempre"+os.str(), prefix) ) {
00124          cgi_var(cgi, "itemid"+os.str(), id);
00125          cgi_var(cgi, "item"+os.str(), val);
00126          
00127          rmspace(prefix);
00128          if(prefix.empty()) continue;
00129          rmspace(val);
00130          if(val.empty()) val = '/';
00131          rmspace(id);
00132 
00133          cmp.id = id;
00134          if( ! cmp.id.empty()
00135             && (ptr=find_if(torm.begin(), torm.end(), cmp)) != torm.end() ) {
00136            if ( ptr->dir != val || ptr->prefix != prefix ) {
00137              uitmp.dir = val;
00138              uitmp.id = id;
00139              uitmp.prefix = prefix;
00140              torep.push_back(uitmp);
00141            }
00142            torm.erase(ptr);
00143          } else {
00144            uitmp.dir = val;
00145            uitmp.prefix = prefix;
00146            toadd.push_back(uitmp);
00147          }
00148        }
00149      }
00150      if( ok ) {
00151        for( i=0, cnt=toadd.size(); i<cnt; ++i ) {
00152          if( chk(toadd[i]) && idb->wwwali_add(domid, toadd[i])) {
00153            err<<"cwwwalimod::wwwali_add: "<<vq.err_report()<<endl;
00154            out<<"<add prefix=\""<< toadd[i].prefix 
00155              <<"\" dir=\""<< toadd[i].dir <<"\"/>";
00156          }
00157          wais.push_back(toadd[i]);
00158        }
00159        for( i=0, cnt=torep.size(); i<cnt; ++i ) {
00160          if( chk(torep[i]) && idb->wwwali_rep(domid, torep[i])) {
00161            err<<"cwwwalimod::wwwali_rep: "<<vq.err_report()<<endl;
00162            out<<"<rep prefix=\""<<torep[i].prefix
00163              <<"\" dir=\""<< torep[i].dir <<"\"/>";
00164          }
00165          cmp.id = torep[i].id;
00166          ptr = find_if(wais.begin(), wais.end(), cmp);
00167          if( ptr != wais.end() ) *ptr = torep[i];
00168        }
00169        for( i=0, cnt=torm.size(); i<cnt; ++i ) {
00170          if(idb->wwwali_rm(domid, torm[i].id)) {
00171            err<<"cwwwalimod::wwwali_rm: "<<vq.err_report()<<endl;
00172            out<<"<rm user=\""<<torm[i].prefix
00173              <<"\" dir=\""<< torm[i].dir <<"\"/>";
00174            continue;
00175          }
00176          cmp.id = torm[i].id;
00177          ptr = find_if(wais.begin(), wais.end(), cmp);
00178          if( ptr != wais.end() ) wais.erase(ptr);
00179        }
00180      }
00181      out<<"</inv>";
00182    }
00183    for( i=0, cnt = wais.size(); i<cnt; ++i )
00184      out<<"<item prefix=\""<< wais[i].prefix 
00185         <<"\" val=\"" << wais[i].dir << "\" id=\""
00186         << wais[i].id << "\"/>";
00187    for( cnt+=cnt_add; i < cnt; i++ )
00188      out<< "<item/>";
00189  } else out<< "<getcant/>";
00190 }
00191 /**************************************************************************
00192  *  
00193  *  ***********************************************************************/
00194 char cwwwalimod::run() {
00195   if( ! (sessb.ai.flags & cvq::admin) ) return notme;
00196   
00197   cgicc::const_form_iterator fi = cgi.getElement("conf");
00198   if( fi != env.cgi_end_get() ) {
00199     fi = cgi.getElement("id");
00200     if( fi != env.cgi_end_get() && fi->getValue() == _id ) {
00201       idb.reset(cinfodb::alloc());
00202       
00203       act();
00204       return done;
00205     }
00206   }
00207   return notme;
00208 }
00209 
00214 bool cwwwalimod::valid(const string &dir) {
00215   if( dir[0]=='.' && dir[1] == '.' && dir[2] == '/' ) return false;
00216   string::size_type len = dir.length();
00217   if( dir[len-3] == '/' && dir[len-2] == '.' && dir[len-1] == '.' ) return false;
00218   if( dir.find("/../") != string::npos ) return false;
00219   return true;
00220 }
00221 
00225 bool cwwwalimod::chk( cinfodb::wwwali_info & wai ) {
00226   if( htmlbad(wai.prefix, ac_prefix_ok.val_str().c_str(), 
00227     ac_html_br.val_str().at(0))) {
00228     out<<"<prefixchars prefix=\""<< wai.prefix
00229       <<"\" dir=\""<< wai.dir <<"\"/>";
00230     return false;
00231   } 
00232   if( htmlbad(wai.dir, ac_ftp_ok.val_str().c_str(), ac_html_br.val_str().at(0)) ) {
00233     out<<"<dirchars prefix=\""<< wai.prefix 
00234       <<"\" dir=\""<< wai.dir <<"\"/>";
00235     return false;
00236   } 
00237   if( ! valid(wai.dir) ) {
00238     out<<"<dir prefix=\""<<wai.prefix
00239       <<"\" dir=\""<< wai.dir <<"\"/>";
00240     return false;
00241   }
00242   return true;
00243 }
